keyword: how many calories are in pop tarts
title: How Many Calories Are in Pop Tarts?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in Pop Tarts with a full nutrition breakdown per pastry, including carbs, sugars, fat, and quick tweaks for different flavors.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Pop Tarts?
assumptions: Standard frosted strawberry flavor, Kellogg's brand; one pastry (52 g serving); no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand, frosting type, and serving size. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One frosted Pop Tart contains about 200 kcal, mostly from carbs and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Toaster pastry with peanut butter flavor

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Pop Tart?
faqs.a: Approximately 200 kcal for a standard frosted variety.

faqs.q: Are Pop Tarts high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, one Pop Tart has about 17 g of sugars.

faqs.q: How many carbs in Pop Tarts?
faqs.a: Around 38 g of carbs per pastry, with 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Do Pop Tarts have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat per serving in modern formulations.

faqs.q: Calories in unfrosted vs frosted Pop Tarts?
faqs.a: Unfrosted is slightly lower at ~180 kcal, due to reduced sugar and fat.
